casebody.data:
No. 10-6833 (R46-004). Eugene Thomas, Petitioner v. Louisiana. 562 U.S. 1027, 131 S. Ct. 556,

178 L. Ed. 2d 411,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8661. November 3, 2010.

The petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeal of Louisiana, Fourth Circuit, in the above-entitled case was dismissed today pursuant to Rule 46 of the Rules of this Court.

Same case below, 54 So. 3d 1.
